trustfund:
TF026102-PHRD-JUDICIAL REFORM PROJECT,TF037862-PHILIPPINES - JUDICIAL REFORM,TF039870-PHILIPPINES-JUDICIAL REFORM,TF040603-PHILIPPINES INSOLVENCY LAW,TF050807-PHRD-PHILIPPINES: JUDICIAL
            REFORM SUPPORT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Judicial Reform Support Project for Philippines is to
            support an accessible judicial system that will foster
            public trust, and confidence. Negative impacts include: air
            quality, noise, traffic, waste generation, and aesthetics.
            Mitigation measures include: 1) proper housekeeping shall be
            implemented, and regular sprinkling of ground particularly
            during arid days; 2) proper provision of collection, and
            proper handling and storage of construction materials; 3)
            noise generating equipment shall be provided with mufflers,
            proper maintenance of equipment; 4) equipment utilization
            shall be scheduled, work hours shall likewise be schedule
            during daytime only; 5) reusable materials shall be salvaged
            for future related projects, others shall be sold or given
            to workers; 6) domestic wastes shall be collected and
            disposed off with the municipal collection system; 7)
            vehicles/trucks delivering construction materials shall be
            regulated; 8) project's design concept that caters to
            nature shall be considered to further enhance the aesthetic;
            and 9) proper maintenance of vehicles shall be encouraged.
